entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 overnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 3 with temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 3 with temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
